dlentry.dd: A one to five digit number you can use to identify calls made to your customers for accounting purposes.
A call made when your office is closed.
The "keys" next to the lamps on the telephone. You press the buttons to call other telephones or to make an outside call.
The ability to forward a call to another user in your company or to an outside line.
The feature that lets you send a call to another telephone.
The feature that lets a call wait at your telephone if you are busy on another call and reminds you the call is waiting.
A call between up to 10 people.
The feature that allows you to keep all calls from ringing at your telephone.
The telephone receiver that you use to listen and speak.
The calls you make to other telephones within the system.
A call forwarded or transferred between two different outside lines.

Prevents automatic answering of intercom calls. If PRIVACY/FLASH is preselected (pressed before lifting the handset or pressing Speaker), it will force the other telephone to answer without the speakerphone.
The button that you use to begin programming your telephone.
A built-in feature of your telephone that lets you speak and hear a conversation without using the handset.
The button, in conjunction with another button, that lets you speed dial an outside number or automatically redial the last number dialed.
A feature that allows you to transfer a call without waiting for a reply from the person you are transferring to. Also called unscreened automatic speed transfer.
An individual telephone set.
The buttons you use to select other extensions in the system.
The person authorized to make changes to the telephone system and to keep records of the modifications.
A number from 200 to 263 that identifies each telephone in your system.
A series of distinctive sounds used by the system to indicate the type of events occurring with your telephone.
Allows a user on a call to press an SS button to place a party on hold and initiate a transfer.
The 64-button accessory that contains 60 telephone and line buttons and lamps and 4 function buttons. It is used to see the status of all lines and stations and to quickly access them.
